document_data.name: Kurthryn Shandarn
document_data.mainbody:
'''Kurthryn Shandarn''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] and good friends with [[Huldyl Rauthur]].{{Cite dragon/276/The New Adventures of Volo: Cormyrian Contracts|77}}
